public abstract class EncryptionTransformFactory<T extends EncryptionOutputTransform,U extends EncryptionInputTransform>
extends TransformFactory<T,U>

Base class for encryption transformation factories.

getTransformClass

public String getTransformClass()
Description copied from class: TransformFactory
Gets the high-level class of transform that this factory provides. The transform engine will use this to test whether the registered factory can decode the given object.

Specified by:
getTransformClass in class TransformFactory<T extends EncryptionOutputTransform,U extends EncryptionInputTransform>
Returns:
the transformation class, e.g. "COMP" for compression or "ENC" for encryption.
